column3: you can't go wrong.  The paella is good if you're hungry or in a group
column4: but I normally fill up on the tapas and the toro brochetas....aka heavenly skewers of perfectly grilled meat on a gigantic metal stick.  That being said
column5: the last time I was home for a visit
column6: my little party of 4 filled up on 6 pitchers of sangria....YUM-O-LA.
